Synopsis: Formats and displays objects in a customizable view.
Description: The Format-View function formats and displays objects in a customizable view. It allows you to specify properties to include or exclude, control output streams, and customize the display format.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Format-View -InputObject $object -Property Name, Age -Stream Verbose
Formats the object with only the 'Name' and 'Age' properties and outputs to the verbose stream.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-Process | Format-View -Property Name, CPU -Stream Host
Formats the process objects with only the 'Name' and 'CPU' properties and outputs to the host.
